Html:
Touchscreen utilising a WPF interface on a <Canvas> element. NAudio responsible for MIDI and Audio, selecting from up to 8 simlutaneous bar-loops and mixing together as well as applying filtering and gain. Master laptop sends simple MIDI commands to slave laptop, which is responsible for outputting the video clips using <MediaElement>

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZMKOF64ckYw
awesome, always great to hear what people are building with NAudio
